item.title: Help
item.description: Setup local environment: Install Git Install Hugo Execute the command: git clone https://github.com/cosheafclub/hugo-blog.git Create a post: Go to the directory hugo-blog Execute the command: hugo new posts/<post-name>.mmark Edit the file content/posts/<post-name>.mmark with your favorite text editor. Before uploading the content, try it in your computer by running the command hugo server -D. Open a web browser and go to http://localhost:1313/ Once you are happy run execute the command hugo, commit and push the repository.
